title: Karrueche Tran Awarded Restraining Order Against Chris Brown After He Allegedly Threatens To Shoot Her
text:
For years, people have speculated about whether Chris Brown was abusive to longtime ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran and new documents show that he, unfortunately, was.
According to TMZ , Karrueche has successfully obtained a restraining order against Chris Brown, after filing legal documents stating he tried to kill her and physically abused her in the past. Earlier this month, she claimed in a sworn statement to a judge, Chris “told a few people that he was going to kill me.” He allegedly told her friends if he can’t have her no one else can, and threatened he was going to “take me out” and “threatened to shoot me.”
Karrueche reportedly has reason to believe Chris might make good on that threat. In addition to the abuse we know he’s capable of as a result of his relationship with Rihanna, Karrueche said several years ago Chris “punched me in my stomach twice” and “pushed me down the stairs.” According to TMZ, this happened while Chris was on probation for beating Rihanna.
Friends of Karrueche have been threatened as well, the legal documents state, which isn’t hard to believe after witnessing Chris try to get in a car with Karrueche after leaving a nightclub in LA in 2015 and telling one of her friends, “Move to the back before I make you move.”

He also posted this video a few weeks back hinting at his stalkerish ways when it comes to exes.

Hopefully Karrueche is comforted by this restraining order, which requires Chris stay 100 yards away from her, her mom and her brother.
